meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mealy.
meanings.sent1: The mealiness of the apple made it unpleasant to eat.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the mealiness of the flour between my fingers.
meanings.sent3: The mealiness of the cookie dough made it look like sand art.
meanings.sent4: The mealiness of the soil reminded me of freshly fallen snow.
meanings.sent5: The mealiness of the bread left a chalky residue on my hands.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a texture resembling that of meal.
meanings.sent1: The mealiness of the peach gave it a soft and crumbly texture.
meanings.sent2: The mealiness of the biscuit made it perfect for soaking up gravy.
meanings.sent3: The mealiness of the mashed potatoes made them look like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The mealiness of the sand on the beach felt like walking on powdered sugar.
meanings.sent5: The mealiness of the cake made it melt in my mouth like cotton candy.
